original_title: Sale of alcohol and cigarettes down by 30 to 40 percent
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said the sale of alcohol and cigarettes has decreased by 30 to 40 percent.
The State Minister said the legal sale of alcohol and cigarettes was reduced as a high tax was imposed.
The State Minister added that a majority of low-income earners are unable to afford alcohol and cigarettes.
